attributes.action: Make Clint Eastwood a sir -before he dies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clint Eastwood is now in his eigthies, his career has brought unlimited joy to millions of British Citizens.

Not ccounting his charity work woldwide.
The least we can do in this country to show his appreciation is to knight him.

We call on the PM to  make Clint Eastwood A knight of the realm.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
